resume_text:
NAME: Henry Irwin
EMAIL: henry.irwin@example.com
PHONE: 555-444-5555

SUMMARY:
A Cloud Architect with extensive experience designing and implementing cloud-based solutions on AWS.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, Terraform, CloudFormation, Python, Linux, Networking, Security

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Company - Cloud Architect (2015 - Present)
 - Designed and deployed cloud infrastructure for various clients on AWS.
 - Automated infrastructure provisioning using terraform.
Old Tech Company - Systems Engineer (2012 - 2015)
 - Managed on-premise server infrastructure

EDUCATION:
University of Texas - Bachelor's in Information Technology (2012)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
